item.description:
This week's topic: Gratitude and positive emotions

Consider this statement: "Your experience of life is not based on what happens to you but on what you pay attention to" (Gregg Krech). Notice how you mood changes when you decide to pay attention to positive things in your life. Think of the strengths and resources you have that can help you deal with stressful situations. Practice gratitude, forgiveness and most of all laughter!

And if you need a reason to laugh watch the comedian Louis CK talking about how these days â€œEverything is amazing and nobody is happy". It's pretty funny and goes very well with the topic of gratitude :) so I couldn't help but include a link for you:

http://www.youtube.co...

Enjoy and I hope to see you in group!

Emilia
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation Group Meetup
